name: ldualgrp
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

stmt.origin: ldualgrplem(c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c1), cof(cfv(cplusg, c1)), cfv(clfn, c1), cfv(csca, c1), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c1)), cfv(cmulr, cfv(csca, c1)), cfv(coppr, cfv(csca, c1)), cfv(cvsca, c0), w0)

⊣ (× `(Scalar ` c1))=(× `(Scalar ` c1))

⊣ (× ` c0)=(× ` c0)
